record.name: Send Notification to Child incident when unrelated

rule.ruleDesc: Send HTML Email: IM.Unrelated from Master
rule.condition: parent.incident in $L.file=NULL and parent.incident in $L.file.save~=NULL and jscall("settings.getSettingValue", "Incident", "im.master2child.notify")=true
rule.conditionDesc: ( Expression: parent.incident in $L.file=NULL and parent.incident in $L.file.save~=NULL and jscall("settings.getSettingValue", "Incident", "im.master2child.notify")=true)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"parent.incident in $L.file=NULL and parent.incident in $L.file.save~=NULL and jscall("settings.getSettingValue", "Incident", "im.master2child.notify")=true"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Send HTML Email: IM.Unrelated from Master (when ( Expression: parent.incident in $L.file=NULL and parent.incident in $L.file.save~=NULL and jscall("settings.getSettingValue", "Incident", "im.master2child.notify")=true))
